Changelog
=========


1.1.6 (2010-03-21)
==================

* Fixed a few typos
* More documentation
* Better test coverage


1.1.4 (2010-03-19)
==================

* Added some unit tests
* Updated the documentation
* Changed the way registering and getting handlers work


1.0.0 (2010-03-19)
==================

* First public release
* Added Django template tag
* Added App Engine backend
